parts.text: You are a computer vision system. You are a computer vision system. Describe this image in detail. Detect all human faces with as tightly as possible, do not include too much besides the face, and output the coordinates of faces. Detect location and output location" Task: Detect all human faces in the provided image.  Output format: Return ONLY valid JSON in this exact schema:  { "image_width": number, "image_height": number, "description": string, "faces": [ { "face_index": number, "confidence": number, "box": { "left": number, "top": number, "right": number, "bottom": number } } ] }  Rules: - Coordinates must be in absolute pixels. - (x, y) is the top-left corner. - Do NOT include any text outside the JSON.
